definition: to arrange/to exhibit/to move to and fro/a pendulum

sentences.english: The mixed pendulum is a new one which consists of a simple pendulum and a compound pendulum.
sentences.chinese: 混合擺是由單擺與復擺構成的一種新型擺。

sentences.english: The paper discusses the law of the damping-without-drive simple pendulum motion through phase-graph method.
sentences.chinese: 用相圖法分析討論了有阻尼無驅動單擺的運動規律。

sentences.english: Methods An animal model of concussive brain injury in rats was duplicated with a metallic pendulum-striker concussive device.
sentences.chinese: 方法用金屬單擺打擊裝置複製大鼠單純性腦震盪模型。

sentences.english: The pendulum swings back and forth.
sentences.chinese: 這就像單擺一樣來回擺動。

sentences.english: This paper studies the nonlinear motion law of a simple pendulum with damping factor.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究具有阻尼因素的單擺非線性運動規律。

sentences.english: I give this pendulum a tangential speed.
